institute.instituteTag: Breaking the boundaries of traditional childcare and daycare.
institute.introduction:
Pat and Janice Vinson opened the first Kids ‘R’ Kids in 1985, celebrating their 30 Year Anniversary. They have an incredible 54-year history in preschool development and management, which began with their first preschool in 1961. 


Their unique vision – breaking the boundaries of traditional childcare and daycare – has propelled the Kids ‘R’ Kids name to its current household status, a true testament to their experience and commitment. Kids ‘R’ Kids Learning Academies provide a secure, nurturing, and educational environment for children, a place for children to bloom into responsible, considerate and contributing members of society. 


Kids ‘R’ Kids wants all children to have the opportunity to grow physically, emotionally, socially and intellectually by playing, exploring, and learning with others in a fun, safe, and healthy environment. As a family-owned and operated organization, Kids ‘R’ Kids welcomes positive family involvement and encourages a parent-teacher approach where the needs of every child come first to obtain successful early childhood education and school-age care.

institute.instituteTag: A business unit of TAL Education Group (NYSE, TAL), established in Beijing in 2009.
institute.introduction:
First Leap English, a business unit of TAL Education Group (NYSE, TAL), established in Beijing in 2009, is flourishing and expanding across China, with over 30, 000 students, and top 3 brand recognition in the Chinese education industry. Created to provide much-needed quality afterschool English training for children aged 1.5 – 15 years old, in a fun, motivating and entirely English speaking environment. 


First Leap provides children with high quality and full scene English education. The school has developing and innovating internationally leading educational products and services since 2008. Which committed to providing scientific parenting solutions for Chinese families. Teaching English is not only purpose, but also encourage and cultivate children’s self-confidence, happiness, and comprehensive quality leadership, with a new generation of global competitiveness.


First Leap has opened more than 80 teaching centers in more than 30 cities in China. The full curriculum system is based on the CLIL education concept, the high-tech education method, which developed and innovated by domestic and foreign experts. The curriculum covers young children stage, pre-school stage, primary and junior high school stage, which help children get through overseas high school.

institute.instituteTag: An experiential English teaching and training organization.
institute.introduction:
Meten is an experiential English teaching and training organization, founded in New York, Beijing, Shenzhen in 2006. Currently has more than 20 cities in China, with more than 90 direct training centers, training trainees Nearly 200,000, the company elite team of more than 3,000 people, the product covers business English, practical spoken language, IELTS training, TOEFL training, online English and overseas study projects. 


Meten focus on the actual use of language students, from curriculum development, teaching services, Environmental optimization, interactive learning and so on for students to create a full range of English learning environment to meet the adult and adolescent English learning needs.

institute.instituteTag: A public school funded by the Education Commission of Haidian District, Beijing, China.
institute.introduction:
RDFZ XISHAN SCHOOL is a public school funded by the Education Commission of Haidian District, Beijing, China. Established in 2009, it is a satellite school of the high school affiliated to Renmin University (referred to as Renda Fuzhong or RDFZ for short). 


RDFZ XISHAN is also the first public school in China to be certified as an Apple Distinguished Program School. The School has traditional Chinese-themed classrooms specially designed for calligraphy, tea-drinking, and guqin instruments. Modern technology rooms are equipped with MakerSpace 3D Printers and Robotics, and wireless high-tech hardware. Refurbished Science Laboratories contain new equipments like fully-equipped and automated benches in chemistry lab, Vernier sensors and probes in physics lab, and e-microscopes in biology lab.

institute.instituteTag: A private school invested by SMIC Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., Ltd. in the fall of 2005.
institute.introduction: Beijing SMIC Private School is a twelve-year school invested by SMIC Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., Ltd. in the fall of 2005, covering an area of about 30,000 square meters and the school area is nearly 20,000 square meters. To serve the core employees of the company employees to address the SMIC service at home and abroad, after the gradual opening up to the community, to share quality education resources by domestic and foreign staff, which welcomed by the community.

institute.instituteTag: Funded by Huawei and managed by Tsinghua University High School.
institute.introduction:
A+W Academy is a school funded by Huawei and managed by Tsinghua University High School. The school is in the central part of the circular arc. The school covers an area of 37,000 square meters, construction area of 13,000 square meters. 


The curriculum is called Tsinghua University High School International Curriculum, which integrates Chinese and Western education philosophy, local and international education essence, with heritages of traditional Chinese ethos and Tsinghua characteristics. 


We provide education to students from Kindergarten to Grade 12. The four Schools are Kindergarten, Primary School from Grades 1 to 5, Junior High School from Grades 6 to 8, and Senior High School from Grades 9 to 12. From kindergarten to Primary School, students immerse in a Chinese-English bilingual environment. From Junior High to Senior High School, students will gradually transit to English only teaching mode and be prepared for future top international university education.   


The mission of Tsinghua University High School is cultivating the talent with infinite possibilities, and creating the world of infinite possibilities. We strive to build an education platform, integrate the best education resources and teaching practice, to improve the students' spirit through the academic lessons, physical education, science and technology education and art education. On the basis of cultural accumulation, innovation thinking and knowledge reserve, we cultivate the thought of independence, the spirit of freedom and the consciousness of responsibility.
